title: King Crimson - The Road To Red (2013) [2 Blu-ray]
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                         King Crimson - The Road To Red (2013) 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 Artists: King Crimson
 Title: The Road To Red
 Genre: Progressive Rock, Art-Rock
 Label: Panegyric Records - KCCBX7
 Released: 2013
 Artists Country: the UK
 Quality: Blu-ray audio

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 BD specs:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 BD1:
 LPCM Audio / 9216 kbps / 2.0 / 192 kHz / 24-bit 
 
 BD2:
 A1: LPCM Audio / 9216 kbps / 2.0 / 192 kHz / 24-bit
 A2: LPCM Audio / 4608 kbps / 2.0 / 96 kHz / 24-bit
 A3: LPCM Audio / 13824 kbps / 5.1 / 96 kHz / 24-bit
 A4: DTS-HD Master Audio / 6493 kbps 5.1 / 96 kHz / 24-bit 
     (DTS Core: 5.1 / 48 kHz / 1509 kbps / 24-bit)
 
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Info:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 Two Blu-ray discs feature the five complete concerts captured on multi-track tape,
 presented in 24/192 LPCM stereo audio, drawn directly from the original two-track
 stereo Dolby SR half-inch mixdown tapes. 'Red' completes the Blu-ray presentation,
 appearing in original stereo, new stereo and 5.1 multi-channel mixes.       
 These Blu-ray discs are the part of 21CD + DVD + 2 Blu-ray discs box set: 
 21CD box set can be found here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9136910
 DVD can be found here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/9139335
